title: Perfect Little Wife
description: I’ve played the perfect little wife all these years, but it turns out, my husband’s a total prick. Not only is he a cheating control freak, he also owes the mob money. I’ve become collateral.But I’ll tell you the truth. I don’t hate it. And the man I’m supposed to be afraid of? I crave him. It’s wrong. I’m a married woman. But his touch brings me to life. His taste is addictive. And he makes me feel so indecent. Dirty, a little taboo, insta-love, HEA story with an alpha male. This is a standalone novella. This book contains strong language, sexual, and violent scenes that may cause trigger to some readers. Reader’s discretion is advised.
author: Delaney Wild
